It is unsafe to trust to feelings or impressions; these are unreliable guides. God\92s law is the only correct standard of holiness. It is by this law that character is to be judged. If an inquirer after salvation were to ask, \93What must I do to inherit eternal life?\94 the modern teachers of sanctification would answer, \93Only believe that Jesus saves you.\94 But when Christ was asked this question He said, \93What is written in the law? how readest thou?\94 And when the questioner replied, \93Thou shalt love the

Lord thy God with all thy heart, ... and thy neighbour as thyself,\94 Jesus said, \93Thou hast answered right: this do, and thou shalt live.\94 Luke 10:26-28.
